# astpy_package

This is astpy package from Anton Setiazi.
Some function that you can use..

- convertDateToSQL
- dictfetchall
- first_day_of_this_month
- first_day_of_this_year
- last_day_of_this_month
- generateYears
- namedtuplefetchall
- oneCursorResult
- previousMonth
- previousMonthWithFirstDate
- pdf/render_to_pdf
- toNumber
- userMenuFilter
